Summary: Miracle Noodle Angel Hair Pasta at Amazon
text: I reluctantly ordered these noodles,after reading other reviews. Today, I tried them and they were wonderful! I rinsed them in a calender with warm water. Then I mixed them with a homemade low cal spaghetti sauce,then heated in the microwave. Very nice and filling. I will buy again to help me drop some calories,plus pounds! They smelled and tasted just like the sauce.
